content: pattern information basic slightly oversized raglan sweater worked top-down with one strand of friends kid silk and one strand of friends wool held together great beginner project size xs s m omitted if using the magic loop method stitch markers tips and info the bobbie sweater has a positive ease of approx 10-15 cm/4-6 inches if you want a more fitted model you can go down a size **find
